item.title: About Bevan
item.description: I am a web technologist from Auckland, New Zealand. I enjoy being a Dad, snowboarding and building amazing user experiences on the internet. I have 10 years experience doing what I am most passionate about; building websites! I find it satisfying to solve problems. I have very advanced skills and experience with JavaScript, HTML, CSS, PHP and MySQL. I am looking for opportunities to work more with Angular JS, Node.
